page.title: 06COPPLESTONE C.P. SCHOOL
page.content: Our school (a country school) has about 150 children, from four to eleven. Our school is small for the amount of children. The children wear green tops and grey trousers or skirts and sometimes in the summer girls wear green and white checked dresses. We have each planted a tree, for we have a rough area full of wild plants. We have a fairly big playing field, and an infant and junior playground each. We don't have desks, we have trays where we keep our books. Our classrooms have too many children really. Our headmaster is a teacher as well as a headmaster. We often have students to help to teach us. Each year we have a Christmas play. From our classroom windows, most of us can see lots of fields and countryside.
